base_description: Gray cylindrical container with a round lid.
part_description: Consists of a cylindrical body and a flat, round lid. The body is smooth and uniform, while the lid fits snugly on top.
internal_interaction_description: The lid securely covers the cylindrical body, creating an airtight seal. The smooth surface of the body allows the lid to slide on and off easily, while the snug fit ensures contents remain secure.
external_interaction_description: The container can be easily handled and opened by people. It can store various substances like powders or liquids, protecting them from external elements. Its cylindrical shape allows it to fit snugly in storage spaces or be stacked with similar containers.
